name: Shooter & Coin Collector
description:
This is my first game made inUnity and i am hoping to make a better game next time after getting the hang of unity little better.

A simple game where u shoot a ball to collect coins , while the platforms from the top are falling randomly, avoid them by moving with right mouse click click  , press left click for power and then release the click to shoot the ball, press left click and move mouse while holding down the click for rotation of the turret. try to survive and enjoy.
